dict.string:
#!/bin/bash
IFS=$'\n'
files=($(ls "${folder_path}"/*.md))
echo '<?xml version="1.0"?> <items>'
for file in "${files[@]}"; do filename=$(basename $file)
echo "<item arg=\"$file\" valid=\"yes\">\ <title>${filename%.*}</title>\ </item>" done
echo "<item arg=\"\" valid=\"yes\">\ <title>Create new list</title>\ <icon>./create-new.png</icon>\ <mod key=\"command\" subtitle=\"\" valid=\"no\" arg=\"\"/> </item>"
echo '</items>'
exit

#!/bin/bash
IFS=$'\n'
files=($(ls "${folder_path}"/*.md))
echo '<?xml version="1.0"?> <items>'
for file in "${files[@]}"; do filename=$(basename $file)
echo "<item arg=\"$file\" valid=\"yes\">\ <title>${filename%.*}</title>\ </item>" done
echo "<item arg=\"$file\" valid=\"yes\">\ <title>Create new list</title>\ <icon>./create-new.png</icon>\ </item>"
echo '</items>'
exit
